name: nearest
description: Return nearest value and round down when interpolating half-integers.

name: nearest-up
description: Return nearest value and round up when interpolating half-integers.

name: zero
description: A spline interpolation of zeroth order.

name: slinear
description: A spline interpolation of first order.

name: quadratic
description: A spline interpolation of second order.

name: previous
description: return the previous of the point.

name: next
description: return the next value of the point.
